name: LNDg
description: Lite GUI web interface to analyze lnd data and manage your node with automation.

app_page_content.heading: Instructions
content: LNDg is a lite GUI web interface to analyze lnd data and manage your node with automation. You can open the app with the Open button on the left.
Once open, you will need to login. The default credentials are 'admin' and 'bolt'.
After logging in, you can view your lighting node's information and open channels, close channels, rebalance channels, and update fee rates.
